import React from "react"; const CourseDetailsPage = () => { return (
{/* Header Section */}

Mastering Modern React Development

Unlock the secrets to building fast, scalable, and maintainable React apps using hooks, context, and the latest best practices.

{/* Instructor & CTA Section */}

Jessica Green

Senior React Developer & Instructor

{/* Course Overview Section */}

Course Overview

This comprehensive course dives deeply into React fundamentals and advanced techniques. By building real-world projects, you'll master:

  • React hooks and functional components
  • State management with Context API and Redux
  • Routing with React Router
  • Efficient data fetching and cache management
  • Performance optimization techniques
  • Testing and deployment strategies
  • Building scalable component libraries
{/* Key Highlights Section */}

Key Highlights

40+ Hours Content
Real Projects & Exercises
Certificate of Completion
{/* Requirements Section */}

Requirements

  • Basic knowledge of JavaScript and HTML/CSS
  • Computer with internet connection
  • Eagerness to learn modern web development
{/* Reviews Section */}

Student Reviews

Mark Thompson

{"★".repeat(5)}

This course completely transformed my React knowledge. The projects were relevant and helped cement the concepts. Highly recommend!

Sophia Lee

{"★".repeat(4)}{"☆"}

Instructor explains complex topics so clearly. I feel confident building React apps now.

); }; export default CourseDetailsPage;
